thig5.4:2.1: As this is, so is that,
thig5.4:2.2: as that is, so is this.
thig5.4:2.4: are approved of by the fools.
thig5.4:3.2: active by day and by night,
thig5.4:3.3: From there with my own wisdom,
thig5.4:4.3: I understood that this body is not real,
thig5.4:5.1: There I was disenchanted by the body,
thig5.4:5.4: I am quenched and at peace."
